news.title: Google öffnet seine Infrastruktur via MCP für KI-Modelle

news.title: Increasing revenue 300% by bringing AI to SMBs
news.description: Discover how Podium used OpenAI’s GPT-5 to build “Jerry,” an AI teammate driving 300% growth and transforming how Main Street businesses serve customers.

news.title: How Scout24 is building the next generation of real-estate search with AI
news.description: Scout24 has created a GPT-5 powered conversational assistant that reimagines real-estate search, guiding users with clarifying questions, summaries, and tailored listing recommendations.
